inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: more than or equal to 18 years old

inclusion.criterion: HCC diagnosed by criteria according to AASLD guidelines
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: HCC patients should have been treated prior to randomization by resection, or ablation and achieving rCR
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: treated prior to randomization by resection

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis

exclusion.criterion: Patients known HBV or HIV infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: HCC treatment but without rCR before randomization
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: treated prior to randomization by resection

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: alert male with no acute distress

exclusion.criterion: Patients with other malignancies other than HCC
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Chronic HCV infection for the past 2 years. IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months.
